summary: In October 2021, the Marine Corps transitioned to a new accounting system. While DOD remains the only large federal agency that hasn't achieved favorable financial audit statement results, small agencies in DOD that use the system have. title: DOD Financial Management: Additional Steps Needed to Guide Future Systems Transitions
